title: Can I recite prescribed dhikr on zamzam water as a form of ruqya & drink it? #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: yes I have one question like if I should can I make the Doha that we normally say every morning um part of every morning supplication like I don't want to harm myself or harm other Muslims can I say it with um Zam Zam water please yes you can make this Dua to on and recite it on zamzam water and drink it part of your R part of asking Allah there's no problem in doing so and Allah AEL Knows Best
